#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int T;
    cin>>T;
    long long int rectangle,square;
    long long int row,col;
    for(int i=0;i<T;i++)
    {
        cin>>row>>col;
        rectangle=(row+1)*row*col*(col+1)/4;
        square=0;
        while(row&&col)
        {

            square+=row*col;
            row--;
            col--;
        }
        rectangle-=square;
        cout<<rectangle<<endl;

    }
}
